channel.title: Easter Egg Hunt.bat!
channel.description:
So I spent a good 20minutes of my time making this, enjoy. [code]@echo off :start cls set /p answer=Do you want to hunt for eggs?!? (Y/N): if %answer% == Y goto y if %answer% == y goto y if %answer% == N goto q if %answer% == n goto q :y cls set /p answer=Which direction do you want to go? (N/S/E/W): if %answer% == S goto S if %answer% == s goto S if %answer% == N goto N if %answer% == n goto N if %answer% == E goto E if %answer% == e goto E if %answer% == W goto W if %answer% == w goto W :S cls echo You go south... pause>nul cls echo You found nothing! Lets head back. pause>nul goto start :N cls echo You go north... pause>nul cls echo You find a path way and take it! pause>nul echo Nothing but dog shit :/ pause>nul goto start :E cls echo You go East... pause>nul cls echo Hmm There seems to be something under that pile of grass! set /p answer=Move the grass? (Y/N): if %answer% == Y goto l if %answer% == y goto l if %answer% == n goto m if %answer% == n goto m pause>nul :l cls echo SHIT ITS PEDOBEAR!!!!!! pause>nul cls echo You get raped and explode :/ Suck to be you right now. pause>nul goto start :m cls echo You head back.... pause>nul goto start :W cls echo West pause>nul cls echo You fall into a hole! pause>nul cls echo You found the easter bunny holding an easter egg!!!! echo /`\ /`\ echo (/\ \ / /\) echo )6 6( echo {= Y =} echo /'-_-'\ echo (_)"""(_). echo /* ((* *'. echo ' *)) * *\ echo ' * ((* * / echo \ *)) * .' echo '-.((*_.-' echo ~~~~~HAPPY EASTER?!~~~~~ pause>nul goto start :q cls echo Alright fine you bastard... pause>nul goto start[/code]
http://pastebin.com/Xe39JduH [hr] Just copy and paste and save as a .bat and enjoy! You can review the code above I mean its harmless.
